title: BRIEF-Colgate Recommends Shareholders Reject “Mini-Tender” Offer By Baker Mills
text: March 19, 2018 / 9:13 PM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Colgate Recommends Shareholders Reject “Mini-Tender” Offer By Baker Mills Reuters Staff 1 Min Read   Colgate-Palmolive Co: * COLGATE CONTINUES TO RECOMMEND SHAREHOLDERS REJECT “MINI-TENDER” OFFER BY BAKER MILLS LLC FOLLOWING INCREASE IN NUMBER OF SHARES SOUGHT * COLGATE-PALMOLIVE - ON MARCH 16, RECEIVED NOTIFICATION FROM BAKER MILLS IT INCREASED SHARES TO BUY UNDER “MINI-TENDER” OFFER TO 100,000 SHARES OF CO Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
